# Bonsai llms.txt Integration File

Bonsai is a next-gen social app & developer framework that allows anyone to create and monetize interactive, evolving content.

# Content Types

- User profile: https://app.onbons.ai/profile/{username}
- Post: https://app.onbons.ai/post/{postSlug}
- Token: https://app.onbons.ai/token/{chain}/{tokenAddress}

# Additional Routes
- Studio: https://app.onbons.ai/studio
- Feed: https://app.onbons.ai/
- Stake: https://app.onbons.ai/studio/stake

Sitemap: https://app.onbons.ai/sitemap.xml
